title: Institute for Fed. Elec. runs elections in Mexico

content.question: Which institution has responsibility for organizing federal elections in Mexico?

choices.label: The Mexican Ministry of the Interior
The Electoral Tribunal of the Federal Judicial Branch (TEPJF)
Electoral authorities in each Mexican state and the federal district

unit.text: 4: Party and Electoral Systems and Citizen Organizations

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors of a course country.
